Record & Certify Your Assets

provenance onto the blockchain and self-execute asset transactions using trustless smart contracts.

Reducing fraud, counterfeiting & counterparty risk. With our Fiduciary Asset Management Operation Infrastructure (Famoi)

Get Involved! Learn More
Why Famoi?

We're building the modern day infrastructure for fiduciary asset management. To cryptographically record and certify the worlds assets onto a new information technology called the blockchain, and link the provenance of an asset to its owner, past owners, creator and origin. Protecting indviduals, businesses and governments from fraud, counterfeiting and reducing counterparty risk by automating asset transactions with self-executing smart contracts that no one controls and everyone may trust.

  • Provenance Relationships

    Link asset provenance and its relationships with current owners/past owners or your whole supply chain. Helping prove your asset or product is authentic for future owners. Creating trust between your customers and suppliers.

  • Search Transactions

    Search global asset transactions in realtime. All transactions are cryptographically hashed and in the public domain.Prooving a transaction existed and occured at a particular time.

  • Pay-on-Performance

    Pay your suppliers on performance and track your assets autonomously with smart contracts. Computer programs that self-execute the terms of your contract.

Famoi Explorer

Asset Transactions

How it works

01::User Selects Asset Class

Class of assets can range from commodities, luxury assets, property, shipping, geonomics, yachts/aircraft or precious metals for example. asset class has smart tag that when recorded onto the blockchain will be included in your assets hash to define the type of asset you are recording.

02::User drafts a Smart Contract

Select smart contract from the marketplace created by us in collaboration with legal experts in the contract marketplace or have your legal expert or developer draft one using our smart contract editor or work with us directly.

03::Add Your Assets Relationship links

Upload infromation on provenance for your asset. Relationships: Past owners, valuers, insurers, creator and origin for example. Then input the public keys for these relationships to link them to your asset. If they do not have a public-key, invite them to Famoi to create one.

04::Upload Contract/Agreement

When executing an asset transaction (Change of hands in supply chain, asset loan or transfer of ownership) you may upload and record a physical contract/agreement to the blockchain and link this to your asset. Smart contracts only automatically self-execute terms of a contract.

05::User Executes Smart Contract

Your smart contracts logic outputs an action to any terms, once the terms conditions are met by each party in a transaction. This could be asset shipment tracking, transfer of ownership or loaning luxury assets for a select period of time.

06::Asset Information Cryptographically Hashed

Your assets information should now be securely recorded on the blockchain, with any videos or images stored in a distributed file storage system.

07::Receive a blockchain certificate

This proves your assets information was recorded and certified on the blockchain and what transactions occured. These can be added directly to a google sheets or downloadedable as .pdf, .xls, .csv and .json file. Always available from your Famoi Dapp.

Fraud & Theft is an Issue

Recording and certifying your assets on the blockchain could help you prove your assets authentic or are owned by you. Creating protection from fraud, theft and counterfeiters.

Global

£2.8 trillion is lost globally

to fraud and mistakes annually and UK businesses and organisations are losing an estimated £98.6 billion to fraud and mistakes annually.

- The Financial Cost of Fraud Report, 2015

Counterfeits

Global trade $250 billon

Organisation for Economic Co-Operation and Development (OECD) estimates global trade in counterfeit goods is over $250bn. Casuing losses of $150bn to G20 countries.

- Trademark Protection and Territoriality Challenges in a Global Economy edited by Irene Calboli, Edward Lee

Art

Costs nearly $7bn annually

The insurance industry estimates the value of the theft of art antiquities worldwide to be nearly $7 billion annually.

- Art Smart: The Intelligent Guide to Investing in the Canadian Art Market By Alan D. Bryce

Jewellery

$100m dollars in losses

The FBI says the Jewellery and Gem industry incure up to $100m in theft annually, thats mainly carried out by professional thieves.

- Criminal Investigation, By Christine Hess Orthmann, Kären Hes

Famoi Proof

Famoi makes maintaining a permanent record of your assets onto the blockchain efficient and orderly in a timestamped and manageable fashion. Which makes doing audits, managing assets, proving provenance or ownership both less costly and complex, whilst allowing you stay compliant with government regulations.

Proof-of-Existence

Asset and its documents existed in this form at a particular time

Proof-of-Ownership

Asset plus any documents link to you the owner, provenance and asset relationships.

Proof-of-Integrity

Blockchain certificates detail assets identity, information stored and relationships to asset.

Proof-of-Audit

All asset changes and updates are searchable/verifiable using Famoi's Explorer. Asset information is viewable only by its owner.

Features

  • Smart Contract Editor

    Simple smart contract editor to draft, compile and execute complex smart contracts.

  • Blockchain Certificates

    Detailed certificates proving when your assets were recorded on the blockchain. Available in PDF & .xls

  • Legally Binding

    Certificates are counterfeit-proof and can be verified by independent third parties.

  • Multi-Sig Security

    Multiple private keys associated to your Famoi DApp. Meaning 2-out-3 keys are required to authenticate transactions.

  • Bulk Services

    Connect to Famoi and intergrate with your own business or goverment organisation application.

  • Smart Contract Marketplace

    Search and select readymade smart contracts created in collaboration with trusted legal experts.

USE CASES


  • Luxury Assets

    Record luxury asset provenance and link your assets to its original creator. Transfer, rent or loan a luxury asset autonomously. Protecting buyers from squiring fraudulent or illegal art, antiquities, jewellery or classic cars and helping prove authenticity.

  • Precious Metals

    Record, certify and track precious metals throughout their journey in the supply chain. Imprinting each asset with a public key (identifier) to the blockchain.

  • Products

    Record and certify your products with a unique public key (identifier) to prove it genuine and not counterfeit. Recording your product on its journey through the supply chain to grow trust with customers, paying providers upon performance, telling your products story and increasing transparency for your company.

  • Diamonds

    Record and certify a diamonds unique imprints and link these back to its current owner, past owner, creator (Jeweller) and place of origin.

  • Pharmaceuticals

    Record and certify key drug information for the consumer and supplier to become informed on your products. Allowing the consumer to view their specific drugs ingredients, origin, creator, providers, suppliers and creation/expiration date.

  • Asset Shipments

    Pay shippers and suppliers autonomously as they perform. Make sure they remain motivated toward your schedules. Record their performance and be alerted when they meet key milestones.

  • Geonomics

    Map and record the worlds Human Geonomes or Virus outbreaks. Making it easy to search for researchers and scientists. So that they may understand, trace and link diseases or virues to the connection between the locations of common human Geonomic errors and the outbreaks cause.

  • Agriculture

    Cataglogue a transparent auditing trail of your agricultural supply chain tp your transactions with providers and suppliers of your goods. From rice, tea leaves, bananas, cattle, sheep and fish for example.

Resources

We're an open-source for-profit commercial venture by Cappui. That wishes to grow a flourishing community of contributors to help us develop, grow and scale Famoi. All contributors and future full-time employees will be given equal recognition. Future full-time employees will primarily be apart of the Cappui team and focus on related internet-of-things technology to integrate and connect with the Famoi Infrastructure.

    • A Decentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO) is the the concept of an idealist outcome of the crypto-tech revolution. The unbundling of services and deregulation of crowdfunding and were two paired themes that added to this combustion. The whole thing was accelerated by a crypto-tech governance layer of technologies and trust-based automations to allow DAOs to run, as Stan Larimer says, "without any human involvement under the control of an incorruptible set of business rules."

    • With increased risk of fraud or theft of luxury assets, precious stones and gems, counterfeiting on the continued rise and a pushed need for more transparency throughout many industries by goverments around the world from manufacturing to finance. By building this platform we aim to be apart of helping protect consumers from fraud, enabling companies to be more transparent and reducing counterparty risk between all parties in asset transactions.

    • Famoi is making the drafting of smart contracts and execution and settlement of asset based transactions simple with the possiablity of trustless trust and absolute assurance of no intermediaries. We realise it is also expensive training new skills and implementing new workflows to your team. And do understand it would be easier to draft smart contracts in a familier yet more efficient way to the way you draft contracts now. Enouragings professionals to learn-to-code as least to a basic level however is important to us and we heavily focus on developing quality documentation and tutorials to guide and teach basic to more advanced methods of coding smart contracts and working with our APIs.

    • It's a huge database distributed all over the world. A database that's immutable, so every recorded asset that is recorded and certified on the blockchain cannot ever be changed, forged or deleted.

    • The consensnus is agreed upon by the stakeholder and developers of the organisation. This consensus can not be broken.

    • No

    • Famoi's consensus is between the Famoi Servers for the 12 seconds until an anchor is set, and then the Ethereum blockchain forever onwards.

    • It is a computer program in its most basic form, that will initiate a set of logical rules (terms) it has been told to carry out. Which when executed runs these rules once its terms have been met. Creating an un-breakable contracts that carry out their actions to their terms autonomously. Reducing the risk of fraud and the need for third-parties.

    • Hello

    • No. Famoi does not take custody of any funds or assets. Famoi's software simply enables businesses and institutions to draft, customise and set rules to a smart contract for an asset and then execute and settle highly personaliseable transactions directly with each other.

    • We're building a community of voluntary developers around Famoi who will be given tokens for participating in the development of Famoi. These tokens are equal to crypto-equity for Famoi's pre-sale sell off. Which is similar to an IPO. These tokens will grow in value the more active and successful the community is. Email us at join@famoi.com to become a Famoi dev.
